original_title: 最愛の人と数年ぶりの再会…一緒に過ごせる僅か数時間は寝る間も惜しんでSEXがしたい
overview: We met through a friend's introduction. They hit it off right away, and it should have been a countdown until they started dating, but a sudden long-term overseas business trip turned it into a blank slate. The two, who can't let go of their feelings, will meet again in the short time of 24 hours. The two of them conveyed their feelings to each other, and in a situation where they didn't know when they would meet again, as long as time allowed, they spent every minute and every second so as not to forget each other's bodies and expressions... passionately. .
title: Reuniting with the love of my life for the first time in several years… I want to have sex with her for the few hours we can spend together. Ayaka Kawakita
